content.text: I like sci-fi and horror, and also some classics. What about you?
I love suspense novels, and I have been a fan of the X-Men since I was a kid.
Cool! I've never been much into comic books, but I've seen a few of the X-Men movies. I'm also a huge fan of Star Wars.
Those are really good movies. What's your favorite one?
Probably the original trilogy. I loved the characters and the story.
Me too. I think I've seen all the movies at least a dozen times each.
Wow, that's a lot! I've seen them all a few times, but not that many.
I love them! What are some of your other hobbies?
I play the guitar and I'm also a vegan.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn to play the guitar.
It's not too hard, and it's a lot of fun.
I'll have to look into it. What's it like being a vegan?
It's great! I feel a lot healthier and I'm more in tune with my body.
That's good to hear. I've been thinking about cutting out meat, but I'm not sure if I could do it.
It's definitely a change, but it's worth it.
